about_the_game:
It's a thrilling VR air combat mini-game. At the beginning of the game, players can choose between different map scenarios and warplanes.

In this game, you have to fly your fighter plane and engage in fierce aerial battles with other small planes. The number of defeated planes and your own health bar are displayed underneath the aircraft, which not only keeps players informed of their battles, but also motivates them to participate more actively in battles. You'll need to show excellent operational skills and judgment to defeat as many enemy planes as possible while dodging enemy attacks. If you are unfortunate enough to be hit by an enemy aircraft, your health bar will decrease, and when your health bar reaches zero, the game ends. The game is won when the required number of enemy planes are defeated. So while dodging attacks, defeat as many enemies as possible.

It is a very challenging and entertaining air combat game. The variety of map scenes, the choice of fighters with various functions, and the intense and exciting combat process all make this game full of appeal. Whether you are a fan or a newbie of air combat games, you can find fun in this game.

How it works:

Pitch: L/R-handle up/down

Yaw: L/R-handle left/right

Reset Position : L/R-handle grip

Quit : Menu key

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
